field.name: label
field.label: Box Label
field.description: The text that appears in the label of search box. If left blank, it will load 'label' string from your language file.

field.name: width
field.label: Box Width
field.description: Size of the search text box in characters

field.name: text
field.label: Box Text
field.description: The text that appears in the search text box. If left blank, it will load 'searchbox' string from your language file.

field.name: button_pos
field.label: Button Position
field.description: Position of the button relative to the search box.

field.name: imagebutton
field.label: Search Button Image
field.description: Use an image as button. This image has to be named searchButton.gif and must be located in templates/*your template name*/images/

field.name: button_text
field.label: Button Text
field.description: The text that appears in the search button. If left blank, it will load the 'searchbutton' string from your language file.

field.name: opensearch
field.label: OpenSearch autodiscovery
field.description: Some Browsers can add support for your site's search if this option is enabled.

field.name: opensearch_title
field.label: OpenSearch title
field.description: Text displayed in supported Browsers when adding your site as a search provider.

field.name: set_itemid
field.label: Set ItemID
field.description: Assign an ItemID for the display of the search results if there is no com_search menu and a specific display is desired. The ItemId may be chosen among those available through the Menu Manager. If you do not know what this means, you may not need it.
